Description:
Detects delete action in the Github audit logs for codespaces, environment, project and repo.

Author: Muhammad Faisal (@faisalusuf)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Github Delete Action Invoked
Query: sourcetype="github-audit" (action="codespaces.delete" OR action="environment.delete" OR action="project.delete" OR action="repo.destroy")
